遇.definition: (bound form) to encounter; to happen upon; to meet unplanned; (bound form) to treat; to receive

遇上.definition: to come across (sb); to run into

遇事生風.definition: to stir up trouble at every opportunity (idiom)

遇人不淑.definition: (idiom) to be in a relationship with or marry a bad person; (idiom) to associate with a bad person

遇冷.definition: to be exposed to cold temperatures; (fig.) (of a market, industry, relationship etc) to be in the doldrums; to suffer a downturn

遇到.definition: to meet; to run into; to come across

遇刺.definition: to be attacked by an assassin

遇溺.definition: (HK) to get into difficulties (in the sea or a swimming pool etc)

遇襲.definition: to suffer attack; to be ambushed

遇險.definition: to get into difficulties; to meet with danger
